alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler and southeastern Putnam Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake George, or 7 miles southwest of Crescent City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Crescent City, Andalusia, Fruitland, Espanola and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
